# bottomLeft

**Instance Property**

The coordinates of the lower-left corner of the observation bounding box.

## Declaration

```swift
var bottomLeft: CGPoint { get }
```

## Accessing the Coordinates

- **bottomRight**: The coordinates of the lower-right corner of the observation bounding box.
- **topLeft**: The coordinates of the upper-left corner of the observation bounding box.
- **topRight**: The coordinates of the upper-right corner of the observation bounding box.
